short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Renew your browser tab look using Recycling Trees extension. Add simple animation to your new tab and have an unique desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking ‘Add to Chrome', you accept and agree to install Recycling Tree Chrome™extension, set the browser new tab search to be powered by Microsoft Bing, and to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

The Chrome Extension Recycling Tree is a beautifully designed and user-friendly tool that will enhance your browsing experience. The animation of a tree in the center of the screen is not only visually pleasing but also serves as a reminder of the importance of recycling. The tree is depicted with leaves falling and then recovering, representing the theme of recycling, and it's the reason why the extension is called Recycling Tree.

The extension also includes a search box that makes it easy for you to find what you're looking for, and the ability to save bookmarks for quick access to your favorite sites. With this extension, you will be able to browse the web in a more efficient and organized way. The user interface is simple and easy to navigate, making it an ideal choice for people of all ages. Whether you're a student, a professional, or a casual web user, Recycling Tree is an extension that will make your browsing experience more enjoyable. With the click of a button, you can add it to your browser and start enjoying its benefits right away.

If you have any questions or feedback about the extension, please feel free to visit our contact page and send us a message. Our team is always happy to help and we value your input. So, why wait? Download Recycling Tree today and start browsing the web in a more beautiful and eco-friendly way!

To learn more about legal terms, check these links:

PP: https://recyclingtree.net/privacy.html
EULA: https://recyclingtree.net/eula.html
